main.subtitle: Hi! I'm
main.name: Tilek
main.description: Here you can get acquainted with my portfolio, view my projects, learn about me and my technology stack.

about.aboutDescription: My name is Tilek. I live in Kyrgyzstan. I started my career in IT as a freelance web designer, after that I started to study layout, delve into writing code, I liked it and I realized that I want to continue doing this. I switched completely to the frontend, began to master new technologies, found my first job, where I rose well in skill, gained experience as a team worker. He also worked on team projects, such as online stores, startups, small businesses, landing pages, corporate websites. Currently, I continue to improve my knowledge, this helps me write more efficient, understandable and easily maintainable code. I strive to keep abreast of the latest trends and developments in the IT world, so I constantly study new technologies and approaches to development. I'm also open to interesting offers, whether it's a full-time job or project work. You can contact me, always in touch :)
about.softSkills: Organization and planning of working hours, analytical thinking, the desire to learn and develop, communication skills, ability to work in a team, stress tolerance
